subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Miami Heat’s Shane Battier and Juwan Howard were teammates in Houston in 2006-7, but their stories also intersect at the bitter rivalry of the early 1990s between Duke and Michigan.
snippet: The Miami Heat’s Shane Battier and Juwan Howard were teammates in Houston in 2006-7, but their stories also intersect at the bitter rivalry of the early 1990s between Duke and Michigan.
